line: Another day, another opportunity to outwit that fool King Darius. Today, I shall become his most trusted advisor.
Deep in the palace gardens, Zafir hatched his most devious plan yet.
Zafir, my friend! Have you heard the news? A treasure map has been discovered in the old archives!
A treasure map, Your Majesty? How fascinating! May I examine it?
Of course! But I'm worried about my current advisor, Minister Aldric. He seems suspicious of everything I do.
Perhaps he doesn't have your best interests at heart, Your Majesty. A true advisor would encourage your noble quests.
Your Majesty, I must warn you about this treasure map. It seems too convenient, too perfectly timed.
Nonsense, Aldric! Zafir here believes it's genuine. Don't you, Zafir?
Indeed, Your Majesty. In fact, I've studied ancient cartography. This map shows clear signs of authenticity.
Your Majesty, please reconsider. I sense deception in the air.
Aldric, your constant suspicion is wearing thin. Perhaps you need a vacation to clear your mind.
An excellent idea, Your Majesty. A wise ruler knows when to trust and when to act decisively.
If you insist on following this map, at least let me accompany you for protection.
Actually, Your Majesty, wouldn't it be better if the Minister scouted ahead? To ensure the path is safe for royalty?
Brilliant thinking, Zafir! Aldric, you shall go first and report back. Take this royal seal as proof of your mission.
Your Majesty, I have a terrible feeling about this, but I shall obey your command.
Unknown to the Minister, Zafir had prepared several traps along the false treasure route.
Safe travels, my dear Minister. May you find exactly what you're looking for.
This path seems treacherous. Wait... what is that sound? Is that... a rumbling?
RUMBLE! CRASH! THUD!
Help! The bridge has collapsed! I'm trapped in this ravine!
Oh my! Your Majesty, it seems there's been an unfortunate accident.
Poor Aldric! We must send a rescue party immediately!
Of course, Your Majesty. But perhaps we should focus on the kingdom's immediate needs first. You'll need a new advisor.
You're absolutely right, Zafir. Your quick thinking and wisdom have impressed me greatly.
I live only to serve the crown, Your Majesty. Perhaps I could temporarily fill the advisory role?
Temporarily? Nonsense! I hereby appoint you as my Chief Royal Advisor!
Your Majesty honors me beyond measure. I shall dedicate my life to your service.
Your Majesty! We've rescued Minister Aldric! He claims the treasure map was a fake!
Poor fellow must have hit his head in the fall. Accidents can cause such delusions.
Your Majesty! Zafir orchestrated this entire scheme! The map, the traps, everything!
Aldric, you're clearly suffering from your ordeal. You need rest and medical attention.
Your Majesty's compassion knows no bounds. Perhaps the former advisor should retire to the countryside for his health.
An excellent suggestion, my trusted advisor. Guards, escort Aldric to a comfortable retirement.
This is not over, Zafir! The truth will come to light someday!
Rest well, old friend. Your years of service are appreciated.
Now, my dear Zafir, what should be our first order of business?
Perhaps we should strengthen the kingdom's defenses, Your Majesty. One can never be too careful about potential threats.
And so, another masterful plan comes to fruition. The kingdom is now mine to influence as I see fit.
Thus, through cunning and deception, Zafir achieved his goal, though his victory would bring new challenges.
